column2: Childers (38)#North Carolina (Shelby)#Childers was shot and killed while trying to escape from an officer.
Joe (24)#Virginia (Chatham)#Hodnett was killed by a state police officer while fleeing. He had been accused of stealing automobile licenses and a trailer.
Henry#Georgia (Valdosta)#Davis was fatally shot by a police officer. He had been accused of wounding a white man.
Fred (22)#Tennessee (Memphis)#Davis was killed by a patrolman after allegedly throwing bricks at people and property.
Leroy (24)#Florida (Miami)#Johnson drowned after being chased by two policemen into a canal.
Wilbert (22)#Florida (Liberty Point)#Jackson was shot by a drunk sheriff.
John (33)#Florida (Miami)#Police officer Simpson fatally shot Johnson inside his apartment building

column3: a student and Sunday school teacher
column4: was killed by an officer on a golf course. He may have been tortured before being killed.
